name: Shoulder moment index
interpretation: indication of the mechanical advantage of the deltoid and major pectoral muscles acting across the shoulder joint

name: Humeral robustness index
interpretation: indicator of general resistance of the bone

name: Index of fossorial ability
interpretation: measure of the mechanical advantage of the triceps and dorsoepitrochlearis muscles in elbow extension, also a good indicator of fossoriality

name: Femur robustness index
interpretation: capacity for supporting body mass and to withstand the vertical forces associated with speed increase
